content.text: Match ends, Leicester City 3, Arsenal 1.
Second Half ends, Leicester City 3, Arsenal 1.
Harry Maguire (Leicester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Eddie Nketiah (Arsenal).
Offside, Leicester City. Aleksandar Dragovic tries a through ball, but Riyad Mahrez is caught offside.
Goal!  Leicester City 3, Arsenal 1. Riyad Mahrez (Leicester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Hamza Choudhury.
Offside, Leicester City. Christian Fuchs tries a through ball, but Jamie Vardy is caught offside.
Substitution, Leicester City. Harvey Barnes replaces Kelechi Iheanacho.
Riyad Mahrez (Leicester City) is shown the yellow card for hand ball.
Hand ball by Riyad Mahrez (Leicester City).
Substitution, Arsenal. Eddie Nketiah replaces Alex Iwobi.
Attempt blocked. Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (Arsenal) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Henrikh Mkhitaryan.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Substitution, Leicester City. Aleksandar Dragovic replaces Danny Simpson because of an injury.
Delay in match Danny Simpson (Leicester City) because of an injury.
Attempt saved. Sead Kolasinac (Arsenal) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Aaron Ramsey.
Corner,  Arsenal. Conceded by Danny Simpson.
Corner,  Arsenal. Conceded by Adrien Silva.

Rob Holding (Arsenal) is shown the yellow card.
Penalty conceded by Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Arsenal) after a foul in the penalty area.

Substitution, Leicester City. Demarai Gray replaces Fousseni Diabaté.
Riyad Mahrez (Leicester City) wins a free kick on the right wing.

Goal!  Leicester City 1, Arsenal 1. Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (Arsenal) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box to the top left corner.
